titleStmt.title: By the Queene Elizabeth by the grace of God queene of England, Fraunce, and Ireland ... Whereas we by our letters patents dated at Westminster the fourth day of Iune in the twenteth yeare of our raigne, did give ...authoritie to ... Raffe Bowes and Thomas Beddingfield ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

notesStmt.note: For granting 12-year patent for sole import of playing cards.
Regnal year of last sheet is misprinted "thirtenth" for "thirtieth".
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
